channel.title: Boon with the Boys
channel.subtitle: Unleashing Ideas, One Conversation at a Time LOL HAHA LOL
channel.itunes:author: Sajid
channel.description: Join Sajid and his eclectic group of friends as they dive deep into fascinating discussions on technology, culture, and the trends shaping our world.

item.title: EP01 - The Tech Trends Shaping Our Future
item.itunes:author: Sajid
item.description: Host Sajid and tech enthusiasts Mike and Laura explore the groundbreaking technologies that are set to redefine our lives in the coming years.

item.title: EP02 - The Rise of Generative Art
item.itunes:author: Sajid
item.description: Artist and AI researcher Emma discusses the burgeoning field of generative art, its implications for creativity, and how it's changing the art world.

item.title: EP03 - Tech and Mental Health
item.itunes:author: Sajid
item.description: Mental health advocate John shares insights on how technology can both help and hinder mental well-being, and what we can do to maintain a healthy balance.

item.title: EP04 - Ethical AI - Challenges and Opportunities
item.itunes:author: Sajid
item.description: AI ethicist Dr. Patel discusses the pressing ethical issues in AI development, from bias and fairness to privacy and accountability.

item.title: EP05 - Building a Sustainable Future with Technology
item.itunes:author: Sajid
item.description: Environmental scientist Rachel talks about the role of technology in promoting sustainability and how innovative solutions can address climate change.
